dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's what's happening at your grooming salon today.

appointments.description: Manage your scheduled appointments for today

revenue.title: Revenue Overview
revenue.description: Track your business performance over time

hero.title: Your Pet Deserves the
hero.description: Professional grooming services that keep your furry friends looking and feeling their absolute best. Book your appointment today!

services.title: Premium Grooming Services
services.description: We offer a complete range of grooming services to keep your pets healthy, happy, and looking their best.

fullGrooming.title: Full Grooming
fullGrooming.description: Complete grooming package including bath, cut, nail trim, and ear cleaning

bathBrush.title: Bath & Brush
bathBrush.description: Relaxing bath with premium shampoo and thorough brushing

nailCare.title: Nail Care
nailCare.description: Professional nail trimming and paw care

lovingCare.title: Loving Care
lovingCare.description: We treat every pet with the love and attention they deserve, ensuring a stress-free experience.

safeClean.title: Safe & Clean
safeClean.description: Our facility maintains the highest standards of cleanliness and safety for your pet's wellbeing.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Convenient appointment times that work with your schedule, including weekend availability.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Amazing service! Max looks and feels fantastic after every visit. The staff is so caring and professional.

reviews.name: Mike Chen
reviews.comment: Luna used to hate grooming, but the team here made her feel comfortable. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: Emily Davis
reviews.comment: Exceptional attention to detail. Buddy always comes home looking like a show dog!

cta.title: Ready to Pamper Your Pet?
cta.description: Book your appointment today and give your furry friend the professional care they deserve.

gallery.title: Gallery of Happy Pets
gallery.description: See the amazing transformations and happy faces of our furry clients. Every pet leaves looking and feeling their absolute best!

cta.title: Love What You See?
cta.description: Book an appointment today and let us pamper your pet with the same care and attention.

booking.title: Schedule Your Pet's Grooming
booking.description: Fill out the form below to book an appointment for your furry friend. We'll contact you to confirm the details.

form.title: Booking Information
form.description: Please provide your details and select the services you'd like for your pet.
form.notesPlaceholder: Any special requests or information about your pet...

booking.success: Booking request submitted! We'll contact you shortly to confirm.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about our services or want to schedule an appointment? We'd love to hear from you!

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

services.title: Professional Pet Grooming Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of grooming services to keep your pets healthy, happy, and looking their absolute best.

mainServices.title: Full Grooming Package
mainServices.description: Complete grooming service including bath, cut, nail trim, ear cleaning, and teeth brushing

mainServices.title: Bath & Brush Service
mainServices.description: Relaxing bath with premium products followed by thorough brushing and blow dry

mainServices.title: Nail Care & Pedicure
mainServices.description: Professional nail trimming, filing, and paw care treatment

mainServices.title: Deluxe Spa Treatment
mainServices.description: Premium spa experience with specialized treatments and luxury products

mainServices.title: Flea & Tick Treatment
mainServices.description: Specialized treatment to eliminate and prevent flea and tick infestations

mainServices.title: Express Grooming
mainServices.description: Quick grooming service for pets who need a fast touch-up

addOns.title: Add-On Services
addOns.description: Enhance your pet's grooming experience with these additional services.

pricing.title: Pricing Information
pricing.description: Our pricing varies based on your pet's size, coat condition, and selected services.
pricing.note: Final pricing may vary based on coat condition, behavior, and specific requirements. We'll provide an exact quote during your consultation.
